sentence.Network_en: "Let me in, Di." — "Okay. Just a minute."
I wouldn't trust them in spite of all their la-di-da manners.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管他们处处显得很高雅的样子，我还是不相信他们。

sentence.Network_en: Di Pietro, 45, has been flirting with the idea of a political career.
sentence.Network_cn: 迪彼得罗，45岁，一直有从政的念头。
